publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7135# Michael Matheson: Denny Town Centre Regenerationâ€”That the Parliament considers that there is widespread dissatisfaction among residents in the Denny and Dunipace area regarding the planned Denny Town Centre Regeneration; believes that Denny town centre is in desperate need of regeneration, and would welcome regeneration plans that carry widespread support in the local community.
S3M-7135# Denny Town Centre Regeneration (lodged on 1 October 2010) Rob Gibson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Aileen Campbell*, John Wilson*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-7135# Denny Town Centre Regeneration (lodged on 1 October 2010) Angela Constance*, Bill Kidd*
